casebody.data:
CROWELL
v.
CROWELL 31A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Thomas D. Bumgardner, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Crowell, Andrea Kirby. Amy Simpson Fiorenza, Attorney at Law, for Crowell, William Worrell.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of July 2018 by Defendant to dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
